content: शीतल {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [शीतं लाति ला-क, शीतमस्त्यस्य लच्-वा] ({%a%}) Cool, cold, chill, frigid; अतिशीतलमप्यभः किं भिनात्ति न भूभृतः <ls>Subhāṣ.</ls> ({%b%}) Cool, bearable; महदपि पग्दुःखं शी तलं सब्यगाहुः <ls>V. 4. 13.</ls> --लः {@--1@} The moon. {@--2@} A kind of camphor. {@--3@} Turpentine. {@--4@} The Campaka tree. {@--5@} A kind of religious observance (observed upon the sun's entering the sign {%Aries%}). --लं {@--1@} Cold, coolness. {@--2@} The cold season. {@--3@} Benzoin. {@--4@} White sandal, or sandal in general. {@--5@} A pearl. {@--6@} Green sulphate of iron. {@--7@} A lotus. {@--8@} The root called वीरण <ab>q. v.</ab>
